General.Name: Shenzhen Auto Electric Power Plant Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Auto Electric Power Plant Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and operation of high-power industrial charging equipment in China. It offers electric vehicle charging equipment; and industrial power systems. In addition, the company operates electric vehicle charging station turnkey project; and supplies nuclear safety grade charging power. Further, it is involved in the power quality management business. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yunhong  Wu
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors
